tool.name: Map reads to graph

param.name: reads
param.label: Reads to map
param.argument: This is the fastq reads that you want to map.

param.name: genome
param.label: Genome
param.argument: Select genome you want to map these reads to
param.option: Drosophila Melanogaster SNP and indel graph
Arabidopsis Thaliana SNP and indel graph

tool.help: This tool is a basic wrapper around vg map for single-end reads. The tool runs the command vg map -f reads.fq -g index.gcsa -x index.xg without tweaking any other parameters of vg map.
